call_transcript:
CSR: Thank you for calling ABC Travel, this is John speaking. How may I assist you today?

Customer: Yes, I need to change my upcoming flight plans. I had booked a trip to Hawaii last month but I need to reschedule it.

CSR: I apologize for the inconvenience. May I have your confirmation number to pull up your reservation?

Customer: It's ABC123. This is unacceptable service. I need this fixed immediately!

CSR: I understand your frustration. Let me take a look at the reservation. It looks like the flight is scheduled for next week. We can definitely reschedule this for you. When would you like to travel instead?

Customer: I need it pushed back at least 2 months. I have a work conflict now. You need to fix this for me without any change fees!

CSR: I can rebook this new travel date for you without any change fees. Let me just confirm the new dates and get that rescheduled for you right away. Is there anything else I can assist with today?

Customer: No, that's all I needed. Just get it fixed.

CSR: Absolutely, I'll have the new itinerary sent to your email shortly. Thank you for your patience and for being a valued customer. Have a great rest of your day!
